job.title: Data Scientist I
job.description: ltstronggtabout usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtcoalition is on a mission to provide security for all our cybersecurity and risk management platform brings together insurance threat intelligence expertise and cybersecurity tools to help our customers remain resilient to cyber threats together we are centered around one goal harnessing the power of technology with the safety of insurance to provide the first holistic solution to solve cyber riskltbrgtltbrgtour teams not only work to prevent security failures but we help organizations mitigate and recover from incidents when they occur our approach is catching on coalition currently has more than customers who have insured over billion of their risk and our distributed team works collaboratively across north america and europeltbrgtltbrgtfounded in coalition has experienced tremendous growth by remaining true to our founding values thats why we are proud to be named one of incs best places to work in ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtabout the roleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtcoalition is looking for a businessfocused data scientist to join our rapidly growing data science team and use analytics experimentation and predictive modeling to turn the large amount of data we collect into measurable business impact to do well in this role you need a fine eye for detail experience as a data analystscientist and a deep understanding of the popular data analysis tools and databasesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtperform largescale data analysis and develop effective statistical models for segmentation classification optimization time series etcltligtltligtmeet with stakeholders from business and product to understand requirements and convert them into analytical solutionsltligtltligtidentify analyze and interpret trends or patterns in complex data setsidentify actionable insights suggest recommendations and influence the direction of the business by effectively communicating results to crossfunctional groupsltligtltligtlocate and define new process improvement opportunitiesltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtskills and qualificationsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtexperience writing sql queries to extract and prepare data for modeling and analysesltligtltligtstrong analytical skills with the ability to collect organize analyze and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracyltligtltligtexperience utilizing both qualitative analysis eg content analysis phenomenology hypothesis testing and quantitative analysis techniques eg clustering regression pattern recognition descriptive and inferential statisticsltligtltligtcontribute and grow the culture of excellence on our team by bringing processes and best practices to our groupltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtbonus pointsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtinternship experience in solving analytical problems using quantitative approachesltligtltligtexperience working in tableaulooker or similar data visualization toolltligtltligtexperience as a programmer python r perl java andor cltligtltligta bachelors degree in computer science mathematics economics statistics or related technical fieldltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtwhy coalitionltbrgtltbrgtcoalitions culture is one that strongly values humility authenticity and diversity we want to work with people of different backgrounds and different paths in life and we trust our team members to take responsibility share ownership and work for one another we are always looking for collaborative inquisitive and dedicated individuals to join our teamltbrgtltbrgtcoalition engineeringltbrgtltbrgtour culture is one of character humility responsibility purpose and authenticity we are growing rapidly and that growth is enabled by strong teamwork communication and mentorship we want people who are passionate about becoming experts in both the business and the technologies that support it our core platform is written mostly in python with some services in java and go we prefer to use the right tool for the job and make pragmatic decisions about how to scale and decouple systems as we continue to grow were looking for someone who can navigate a cloud environment aws with many moving pieces and systems to help the team understand how they fit into the broader puzzleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtrecent press releases ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtcoalition raises m to build the future of commercial insuranceltbrgtltbrgtforbescom next billiondollar startups ltbrgtltbrgtcoalition is proud to be an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer we do not discriminate based upon race religion color national origin sex including pregnancy childbirth or related medical conditions sexual orientation gender gender identity gender expression transgender status sexual stereotypes age status as a protected veteran status as an individual with a disability or other applicable legally protected characteristicsltbrgtltbrgt
